item.title: Himegashima Island
item.description:
Title: Himegashima Island
Genre: Adventure , RPG , Simulation
Developer: Fushidaratei
Publisher: Kagura Games
Franchise: Kagura Games
Release Date: Aug 2, 2024




About This Game




Under the pretense of receiving training to become the head of the Kinusato family, Kokomi is sent to stay with his relatives on Himegashima. However, his cousin Asuka demands that he enjoy his summer on the island and make lots of happy memories. Having grown up sheltered, there's a whole new world of things for Kokomi to experience. The hot midsummer sun and the cries of cicadas everywhere... The gentle waves crashing against the shore and the bustle of restaurants on a busy night... Kokomi will experience all Himegashima has to offer and more during his short time there.


Explore the gorgeous island of Himegashima and earn Good Boy Points to unlock new privileges by helping its residents. Whether it be unlocking new locations such as a hair-raising swamp or getting to hang out with your friends, no good deed goes unrewarded! Of course, it wouldn't be much of a summer without plenty of outdoor activities to participate in. Collect fish and insects to fill out your field guides, then use those insects in heated bug-fighting matches! Just be forewarned, there's quite a bit more depth and complexity to raising the perfect warrior than meets the eye. You'll have to manage your bonds with your bugs, acquire and combine bug skills to give you an edge in battle, and even let bugs past their prime go in order to transfer some of their power to your future champions. If this all sounds daunting, don't worry! A quick trip to Kakeru Dojo will teach you all the ins and outs of bug fighting and have you raising an undefeatable army in no time!

As if that isn't exciting enough on its own, these are but a select few of the many activities Himegashima has to offer! Create as many memories as you can and do everything in your power to make this the best summer ever!









Minigames
Enjoy various minigames such as rock paper scissors, treasure hunting, fishing, and bug fighting. There are even some games you might not be too familiar with such as yubisuma, where you try to guess the number of thumbs everyone is holding up. Enjoy a summer chock-full of new and exciting experiences!

Secret Base
Collect furniture and decorate your secret base, then invite your friends over to take a look. Different people have different preferences, and how you arrange your base will affect the score they give you. Just don't despair if you get a scathing evaluation. There's always next time!

Rich Story
Enjoy a character-driven story and help the people of Himegashima overcome their problems, whether they be human or... something else? Meet a talking jizou statue, a visitor from another world, and many other colorful characters as you work to leave your mark on the island!



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows® 8/8.1/10/11
    • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
    Recommended:
    • OS *: Windows 11/10/8
    • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Storage: 4 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

item.title: Unrooted
item.description:
Title: Unrooted
Genre: Adventure , Casual , Indie
Developer: 85 Plus Games
Publisher: 85 Plus Games
Release Date: Aug 2, 2024




About This Game

Unrooted is an homage to games like Jump King and Foddian style platformers.
It will make you slam your desk with rage or leap for joy as you make that one jump you've been missing for hours. Travel upwards, discovering new hand painted environments, mocking NPCs, and musical landscapes that will encourage you to adventure farther than you had before.

- A game made for masochists, by masochists

Features


  • Platforming with consequences, every jump is meaningful
  • Mechanics that urge the player to think through the environment like a puzzle
  • Every miniscule success and failure is autosaved
  • Meet fun characters and be mocked by them for your failures
  • Find secrets and easter eggs along your journey upwards
  • Hand painted environments and characters
  • Beautifully inspiring and haunting soundtrack
Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4GHz
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Shader Model 3 support, 512MB VRAM, Intel® HD Graphics 5500 or better
    • DirectX: Version 9.0c
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    • Sound Card: Integrated
    Recommended:
    • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card

item.title: REAL WEB LEGENDS: Carter's Quest
item.description:
Title: REAL WEB LEGENDS: Carter's Quest
Genre: Action , Indie , RPG , Early Access
Developer: Goba
Publisher: Goba
Release Date: Aug 2, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Aug 2, 2024




About This Game

The Story

The mysterious organization known only as "The Helix" is hatching a plan to capture an artifact of great power. The leader of Humanity is missing, presumed dead. The Elves are on the move, capturing territory once again. Tensions are high, all sides need a hero. The future of the planet Web lies in the balance.

Carter, a Human peasant from a remote village, is thrust into the center of a conspiracy to create the ultimate weapon: The Perfect Homunculus.

The Gameplay

Deep combat, inspired by the legends of the character action genre, strikes a delicate balance with exploration and puzzle-solving. Create your own Homunculus to serve as your faithful companion as you fight for your life against artificial machines, malformed creations of wizards long-deceased, and enemies of peace in the land of Web.

The World

Act 1, set in the Human province of Kaliere, takes Carter through the rebuilt Human capital. In the not-so-distant past, war once gripped these plains, and it threatens to do so once again. Learn the history of Humanity, complete side quests, solve puzzles, and walk away with rewards that unlock your true potential as a warrior.





Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Carter's Quest contains occasional scenes of violence, including blood that may not be appropriate for young audiences. In addition, there are scenes with partial nudity in non-erotic contexts.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Any multi-core processor from the last ten years
    • Memory: 6 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Any dedicated graphics card from the last ten years
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 200 MB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

item.title: Evil Corporation Demo
item.description:
Title: Evil Corporation
Genre: Adventure , Indie , Early Access
Developer: Bigbeardev
Publisher: BigBear Games
Release Date: Coming soon




About This Game

Evil Corporation saved your life from a nuclear disaster. Now the Corporation forces you to work as an explorer of dangerous places.

Missions

Your task is to collect scrap metal from abandoned places in order to pay the Corporation for your salvation. You can use the money you earn to open access to more interesting places or improve your research truck. You can explore these wonderful places but do not forget that these places are inhabited.
Remember! High risk high reward! Good luck!

Teamwork

Abandoned places are infested with monsters and they love it when you are alone. You need to check every corner so that you don't get caught by one of them. Each of which has its own abilities and you need to adapt to each of them. Collect as much scrap as possible so that the Corporation does not fire you. Remember! With a team you can take away more things that can be sold!

Play Fast

The longer you stay in prohibited areas, the worse the situation becomes. Communicate with your teammates so you don't forget to take the artifacts to the truck. Make sure that every team member is alive and not left behind.

Levels

At the moment there are 6 levels in the game, each of which will be improved and new ones will be added with new content. At each level, a new danger will await you.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

The game has a realistic atmosphere. Player characters can be killed by various monsters, which can dismember them. Player characters may use fictitious medications recklessly.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 / 11 - 64 bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i5
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 10 GB available space
    • Sound Card: Any
    • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

item.title: Motordoom
item.description:
Title: Motordoom
Genre: Action , Indie , Sports
Developer: Hobo Cat Games
Publisher: Hobo Cat Games
Release Date: Aug 2, 2024




About This Game


Motördoom is a freestyle-sports roguelite horde shooter that combines high octane, visceral combat with fluid movement and trick mechanics. Perform gnarly tricks while defeating grotesque monsters and upgrade your character with demonic offerings to become ever more powerful.



Combine your trick combo with kills to earn even more points. Once you land your combo, gain experience points as high as the combo score. Earn enough points and you'll be given the choice of one of three random Demonic Offerings . These upgrades grant you more power to defeat the ever growing horde of grotesque monsters. So jump up in the air, slow down time and shoot these demonic abominations!



Demonic Offerings come in the form of cards. Build your deck by choosing the right cards for your build. Unlock new cards for later runs to be prepared for the horrors Motördoom has to offer.



Ride your chainsaw driven pit bike through a monster filled arena! Perform gnarly tricks like flips, grabs, grinds and manuals and combine them all into the sickest combo the underworld has ever seen. This arcade freestyle sports game should feel very familiar to anyone who ever played any of the THPS games in the past. Find your own style and do the tricks that you want.



Choose from different characters and bikes that suite your play style. Unlock new characters with scrap you collect in runs. Each character has it's unique weapon and play style. Choose which one suits your style the best.



Unlock and equip different bike Add-Ons to aid you in your run. Create different builds that suit your play style.
How about a chainsaw that tears through your enemies?






Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Blood and gore



System Requirements

Windows

Linux
